common_name.tooltip: Common name of the species. We use a patch to convert biolovision species ID to eBird common name. Don't change this value
common_name.label: Common Name

number.tooltip: Number of individu. Record as ‘present’ if not an integer.
number.label: Number

species_comments.tooltip: Free text comments about the observation
species_comments.label: Species Comments

latitude.tooltip: Latitude of the location, in decimal degrees
latitude.label: Latitude

longitude.tooltip: Longitude of the location, in decimal degrees
longitude.label: Longitude

date.tooltip: The date these observations were made
date.label: Date

state.tooltip: State/province where these observations were made.
state.label: State/Province

country.tooltip: The country where these observations were made.
country.label: Country code
